title: Unable to sync local optimism node

labels.name: P-unconfirmed
labels.description: Issue might be valid, but it’s not yet confirmed

body:
Using this repo: https://github.com/optimisticben/op-replica

But filing the issue in this repo as per request.

My `.env` file:
```
COMPOSE_FILE=replica.yml:replica-shared.yml
ETH_NETWORK=mainnet
DATA_TRANSPORT_LAYER__L1_RPC_ENDPOINT=https://mainnet.infura.io/v3/<redacted>
DATA_TRANSPORT_LAYER__L2_RPC_ENDPOINT=https://mainnet.optimism.io
REPLICA_HEALTHCHECK__ETH_NETWORK_RPC_PROVIDER=https://mainnet.optimism.io
SHARED_ENV_PATH=./kustomize/replica/envs/mainnet
DTL_IMAGE_TAG=0.5.11
L2GETH_IMAGE_TAG=0.5.7
L2GETH_HTTP_PORT=9991
DTL_PORT=7878
```

The containers start off looking healthy:

Edit: Probably unrelated. I didn't get the environment before the `geth init`, my bad. Thanks to @smartcontracts  for finding it.
@nate-staked are you still experiencing this with the latest versions of everything?

I'm going to close this since the issue is quite old now (2 months) and there hasn't been any additional information. If you are still experiencing this issue, please let me know and I will be happy to re-open. Thank you! :pray:
